title: Big Ambitions Directly Download
description:
Your bank balance is tiny, but your ambitions are big. With a little help from your uncle, you get an apartment and your first job. But then it’s up to you to achieve success and take over New York City any way you like. Slowly build multiple small businesses, grow them into huge corporations, or carve your own unique path – the possibilities are limitless in this vast business sandbox. ONI Road to be the Mightiest Oni
You’ve never played anything like this Go from a small apartment and public transport to luxury suites, fast cars and designer furniture. Put your money into investment funds and real estate. Succeed, fail, rebuild. But remember to take care of yourself, sleep and stay happy on your rise to the top. Go from nothing to the most prominent tycoon in New York. Start a business , work smart, make it thrive and enjoy your life. How do you want to be successful?
How far can you push it? How long can you make it last? Start your own gift shop, supermarket , coffee shop, law firm, clothing store, liquor store, florist, and more. You decide what success is – whether it’s a single shop, a chain of fast-food restaurants , a huge corporation, or making millions developing websites from a basement.
Take out a loan, rent a building , design the logo, renovate the store, get stock, manage your money, hire staff, and build your infrastructure. Soon, you may have to start importing products from the harbour and distributing them through a network of warehouses . A bigger business means managers. Hire HR Managers, Logistics Managers, and Purchasing Agents. They all need desks and computers, so you’ll need a fancy headquarters .

system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 960 or similiar (Minimum 2GB vram)
